about_the_game:
Urban Forest is a city building deck-builder.

You are the mayor of a new city and you want to be re-elected. The election is in 4 years. You have 48 months to build up the city and gain the support from different groups. Each group has their own requirements and you will need to complete most of them to be re-elected.

You start with a simple deck of cards. Build and expands your city to fund the expansion of the city. Research new ideas and build improved buildings.

Features

  • Different Mayor with different starting deck, ability and research tree
  • A fully randomised mode with randomised research tree and mayor ability.
  • A career mode where you try to challenge yourself to get re-elected forever.
  • A daily challenge mode with even harder restriction to win.

Can you get re-elected ? if not, you can always start another city.

Developer note

The game is currently in development and some of the features may change in the course of the development. If the idea sound interesting, add it to wishlist and follow me on social :)
